name: Vegan Eggs Benedict Casserole
description: This Vegan Egg Breakfast Casserole is loaded with veggie goodness baked in one pan along with an easy vegan "egg" sauce made from tofu. Mushrooms add a touch of earthy flavor and  savoriness to this vegan breakfast casserole.
recipeIngredient: 2 slices Sandwich bread toasted (then cubed or thinly sliced)
2  green onions (chopped, white and green separated , green used for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the slices, and chop if you haven't already, and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Toast the slices, and chop if you haven't already, and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In 8x7 inch or similar size baking dish, add oil, and spread and add mushrooms, onions, thyme, and salt, and toss well. (Add in a few drops of liquid smoke or mix in some vegan bacon here if you wish ). then put it in the oven at 350 degrees F for 6-8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In 8x7 inch or similar size baking dish, add oil, and spread and add mushrooms, onions, thyme, and salt, and toss well. (Add in a few drops of liquid smoke or mix in some vegan bacon here if you wish ). then put it in the oven at 350 degrees F for 6-8 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, make your egg mix by blending all the ingredients from tofu up to water until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, make your egg mix by blending all the ingredients from tofu up to water until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the baking dish from the oven, then add in the bread, spinach, and peppers, and drizzle the egg sauce all over ,and lightly toss to coat. Even out with a spatula, and bake again for 25-30 minutes, or until the mixture is set in the middle.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the baking dish from the oven, then add in the bread, spinach, and peppers, and drizzle the egg sauce all over ,and lightly toss to coat. Even out with a spatula, and bake again for 25-30 minutes, or until the mixture is set in the middle.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the dish from the oven, garnish with the reserved green onions, and serve after 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the dish from the oven, garnish with the reserved green onions, and serve after 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the hollandaise : mix all the ingredients and 1/4 tsp kala namak in a saucepan over medium heat. Whisk well to mix the flour. Cook until the mixture thickens evenly then take off heat. Add the remaining kala namak after 5 mins and mix in. Use sauce generously over the casserole
recipeInstructions.name: Make the hollandaise : mix all the ingredients and 1/4 tsp kala namak in a saucepan over medium heat. Whisk well to mix the flour. Cook until the mixture thickens evenly then take off heat. Add the remaining kala namak after 5 mins and mix in. Use sauce generously over the casserole

keywords: vegan breakfast casserole, vegan egg casserole
